snippet.title: Vignettes iOS Trailer
snippet.description:
Vignettes is a casual but unique exploration game without text or characters, where objects shapeshift as you spin them around to wander through a kaleidoscope of different moods and settings. 

Accessible and colorful, it is an experience for all to enjoy, filled with playful interactions and hidden secrets.

Download now on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/vignettes/id1100330715

Website: http://vignettesga.me



Trailer made with the help of Dziff: http://www.dziff.com/
Music by David Kanaga: http://www.davidkanaga.com/
